pullrequest.title: Set default camera update rate to 30 Hz

content.raw:
This agrees with our current specification at http://gazebosim.org/wiki/DRC/UserGuide.

I wasn't able to find any place in VRC official documentation or forum related to use a higher rate in sandia hand cameras. One of the participants [announced](https://www.theroboticschallenge.org/forum/default.aspx?Function_fst=ViewThread&ThreadID_fin=170) that 10Hz would be enough. 

Sounds safe for approval.
content.html:
This agrees with our current specification at http://gazebosim.org/wiki/DRC/UserGuide.

I wasn't able to find any place in VRC official documentation or forum related to use a higher rate in sandia hand cameras. One of the participants announced that 10Hz would be enough.

Sounds safe for approval.

pullrequest.title: Set default camera update rate to 30 Hz

content.raw: Something agains adjusting our tests in drcsim to check the lower level accepted at 30Hz? Currently is 45Hz with a 10Hz offset, my intention is to set them at 40Hz with the 10Hz offset.
content.html: Something agains adjusting our tests in drcsim to check the lower level accepted at 30Hz? Currently is 45Hz with a 10Hz offset, my intention is to set them at 40Hz with the 10Hz offset.
